publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-5175 Dr Jean Turner: Congratulations to the National Osteoporosis Society—That the Parliament congratulates the National Osteoporosis Society, which is the only UK national charity dedicated to eradicating the consequences of undiagnosed and untreated osteoporosis, on its work; calls on MSPs to help to encourage everyone they meet to keep good bone health by doing some weight-bearing exercise and remaining active; asks everyone to afford themselves the opportunity of bone-density screening where available, especially if they know that they could be at risk, and encourages everyone to adopt a healthy eating and drinking lifestyle by enjoying a wide variety of food to ensure a mix of necessary vitamins and minerals to influence the 20% of bone health that is not genetically inherited.

S2M-5175 Dr Jean Turner: Congratulations to the National Osteoporosis Society—That the Parliament congratulates the National Osteoporosis Society, which is the only UK national charity dedicated to eradicating the consequences of undiagnosed and untreated osteoporosis, on its work; calls on MSPs to help to encourage everyone they meet to keep good bone health by doing some weight-bearing exercise and remaining active; asks everyone to afford themselves the opportunity of bone-density screening where available, especially if they know that they could be at risk, and encourages everyone to adopt a healthy eating and drinking lifestyle by enjoying a wide variety of food to ensure a mix of necessary vitamins and minerals to influence the 20% of bone health that is not genetically inherited.

S2M-5175 Congratulations to the National Osteoporosis Society (lodged on 16 November 2006) Donald Gorrie*, Robin Harper*, David McLetchie*, Mrs Nanette Milne*, Tommy Sheridan*, Mike Pringle*, Bruce Crawford*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Dr Elaine Murray*, Bill Butler*, Mark Ballard*, Helen Eadie*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Ms Sandra White*, Christine Grahame*, Michael McMahon*, Sarah Boyack*, Bill Aitken*

S2M-5175 Congratulations to the National Osteoporosis Society (lodged on 16 November 2006) Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Mr David Davidson*, Jackie Baillie*, Rob Gibson*, John Swinburne*, Fergus Ewing*, Alex Neil*, Euan Robson*, Carolyn Leckie*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Rosie Kane*, Trish Godman*, Mr Brian Monteith*
S2M-5175 Congratulations to the National Osteoporosis Society (lodged on 16 November 2006) Shona Robison*, Nora Radcliffe*, Linda Fabiani*, Dave Petrie*, Eleanor Scott*
S2M-5175 Congratulations to the National Osteoporosis Society (lodged on 16 November 2006) Shiona Baird*
S2M-5175 Congratulations to the National Osteoporosis Society (lodged on 16 November 2006) John Scott* Contents An A B C D E F G H I J
